tutorial.speak:
Let's learn how to add lessons in Lessons.Church as a For Ministry Resources admin.
First, go to Lessons.Church and click on login.
Enter your credentials and click sign in.
Select your organization.
Click your name or the organization's name at the top right.
Select Admin.
Click the plus sign on the program you want to work on.
To add a new program, use the plus sign in the top right.
To add a new study in an existing program, click the plus study button.
Set whether the study should be live. Usually set to no initially for review.
Add a numerical value for the study's order.
Enter the study name.
Create a slug for the URL - no caps or spaces allowed.
Add a one-sentence description from the website page of the given sermon.
Leave the longer description blank as it's not currently set up.
Leave the YouTube embedded link blank as it's not currently set up.
Add a series graphic - this is required. Click anywhere in the gray box.
Click Upload and choose your image.
Choose the correct image from your computer files.
Click Open.
Adjust the image using the corner handles.
Click Update.
Scroll down and click Save before leaving the page.
